name: Legend of Styles
description:
Top Down 2D Dungeon Crawler with a Magical Element Elements Ice Shard By freezing the air around the player, you throw chunks of ice at the enemy. 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Ice Pillar Summons a pillar of ice at the target location perpendicular to where the user is facing. 

___________________________________________________________________________________________

Frost Breath

 coming soooooooooooooon

The user blows a cold breath to where the user is facing.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

Firebolt By heating the air around the player, you throw embers at the enemy. 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Flamethrower The user blows a hot breath to where the user is facing.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Flame Charge The user cloaks itself in flames and charges towards the target's location perpendicular to where the user is facing. 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Lightning Bolt By causing discharges in the air around the player, you throw bolt of electricity at the enemy. 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Thunder Clap Summons a thunder cloud that the user can move freely to strike the enemy.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Shockwave A fast and unavoidable electric attack that surrounds the player.
